subject: feat: add embed.js auto-resize helper script
body:
Embedders previously had to write their own postMessage listener to
get iframe auto-height working. Now they include one script tag:
  <script src=".../embed.js"></script>

The script auto-discovers all repo-tor iframes on the page and resizes
them when charts report their content height.

Docs updated to use script-tag as the primary approach, with the manual
listener moved to an "Advanced" section.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01G3sd64KAF9sQT7HnjsVrCe
